content.prompt: Which of the following developments helps to explain the change in agriculture depicted in the graph?

choices.label: The extraction of western resources led to the growth of new towns and cities that demanded agricultural goods.
The growth of an internal slave trade provided an enlarged workforce whose labor helped increase agricultural production.
